title: Salon declares VD Day!
author: VD
content_html: So, women are being encouraged to vote their genitalia this election. I hope my pro-suffragist critics will be conscientious about informing Eve Ensler that there’s no need for her latest project, since they’ve done such a wonderful job of demonstrating how women voting has no effect on anything whatsoever.
content_text:
So, women are being encouraged to
vote their genitalia
this election.  I hope my pro-suffragist critics will be conscientious about informing Eve Ensler that there’s no need for her latest project, since they’ve done such a wonderful job of demonstrating how women voting has no effect on anything whatsoever.
